title: Easy Greek salad
ingredients: ['1 medium red pepper (about 100g), chopped', '1 medium green pepper (about 100g), chopped', '140g cucumber, peeled and chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1/2 red onion, peeled and diced', '4 large black olives, quartered', '80g feta cheese, crumbled', '120ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons white wine vinegar', 'Salt to taste']
